description: Breakfast is the most important meal of the day. Start your day right with this tasty and nutritious meal of scrambled eggs, kale and black beans.
name: Scrambled Eggs With Kale & Black Beans Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 35g kale, finely chopped, thick stalks discarded

recipeInstructions.text: Put the kale and beans in a steamer over a high heat and steam until the kale begins to wilt  about 4 minutes.
Meanwhile, toast the bread under the grill.
Heat the oil in a small frying pan over a medium heat. Crack the eggs into the pan and cook, stirring occasionally, until cooked through.
Spread the toast with the hummus, then layer with the kale and beans. Add a squeeze of lime, followed by the scrambled egg, seasoning, and a pinch of cayenne to taste, if you like.
